body: @kang komen I'll gladly fuck your imaginary cute sister.

@Lerkin Rape, blackmail and cuckoldry is right to you? Because that's what the scummy "best bro" engaged knowingly engaged in. I'm getting a great sense of where your moral compass lies, if you even have any.

Nah, he isn't. Ntr isn't my thing, but I liked this one. Just think about it, you have a best bro who has a sister, you have a crush on her, he gives green light to your romance... but then you find he was having incest play with her besides your back. That dude isn't an asshole, he did right. The asshole is the brother.
the guy from the last story... he is so horrible that i couldnt even focus on the delicious fucking because of how much of anasshole he was o___o
